display_name: Overall RDI at 4% oxygen desaturation or arousal
description: RDI at 4% oxygen desaturation or arousal  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas associated with arousal or >= 4% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hremba4 + hroa4 + hnrba4 + hnroa4 + carba4 + caroa4 + canba4 + canoa4 + oarba4 + oaroa4 + oanba4 + oanoa4 ) / slpprdp

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall RDI at 4% oxygen desaturation or arousal
